text: April, April! is a 1935 German comedy movie directed by first time director Douglas Sirk. It stars Albrecht Schoenhals, Carola HÃ¶hn, Erhard Siedel, Lina Carstens, Charlott Daudert, Hubert von Meyerinck, Werner Finck and Hilde Schneider. ==Other websites== * Category:1935 comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Douglas Sirk Category:Movies about Nazi Germany
title: April, April!
